title: Former Malaysian PM Mahathir joins little-known party Putra | The Straits Times
snippet: It is not known if Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad, 97, will hold any posts in Putra. ... Former Malaysian prime minister Mahathir Mohamad has joined little-known Parti Bumiputera Perkasa Malaysia (Putra).

title: Parti Bumiputera Perkasa Malaysia - Wikipedia
snippet: On 25 February 2023, Mahathir joined PUTRA along with 12 other former PEJUANG members, including Mohd Tahir Kassim (Pahang) and Liza Meman (Perak). PUTRA had made a debut contesting for 5 seats in the 2021 Malacca state election.

title: Dr Mahathir receives invitation to join Putra as adviser
snippet: Dr Mahathir Mohamad is seriously considering an invitation by Parti Bumiputera Perkasa Malaysia (Putra) to join the party as an adviser.

title: BERNAMA - Dr Mahathir receives invitation to join Putra as adviser
snippet: According to Dr Mahathir, Putra president Datuk Ibrahim Ali made the offer to join the four-year-old party after the party’s Supreme Council decided on the matter at its meeting today.

title: Mahathir’s former party Pejuang applies to join opposition pact Perikatan Nasional | The Straits Times
snippet: This prompted Dr Mahathir to quit Pejuang, and he subsequently joined little-known party Putra on Feb 25.
